tree.name: Zach LaVine
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: SAC sent De'Aaron Fox and Jordan McLaughlin to SAS; SAC sent Kevin Huerter to CHI; CHI sent LaVine and 2028 2nd (CHI own) to SAC; SAS sent Cissoko, 2025 2nd (CHI own), 2026 2nd, 2027 1st (SAS own), 2027 2nd, 2028 2nd (DEN own), and 2031 1st (MIN own) to SAC
tree.note: 2-time All-Star guard, originally drafted 13th overall by Minnesota in 2014

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Huerter
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded Maurice Harkless, Justin Holiday, and a conditional 2024 1st (did not convey, became 2025 1st, Derik Queen selected) to Hawks for Kevin Huerter
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 19th overall by Atlanta in 2018

assetsGivenUp.name: Maurice Harkless
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward signed as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: Justin Holiday
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Received from Pacers along with Sabonis and Jeremy Lamb for Tyrese Haliburton, Buddy Hield, and Tristan Thompson
assetsGivenUp.note: Shared cost with Domantas Sabonis trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Tyrese Haliburton
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard drafted 12th overall from Iowa State

assetsGivenUp.name: Buddy Hield
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Pelicans to Kings along with Tyreke Evans, Langston Galloway, 2017 1st and 2017 2nd for DeMarcus Cousins and Omri Casspi
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard, originally drafted 6th overall by New Orleans in 2016

assetsGivenUp.name: Omri Casspi
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward re-signed as free agent (second stint with Kings)

assetsGivenUp.name: Tristan Thompson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: SAC sent Delon Wright to ATL; BOS sent Tristan Thompson to SAC; ATL sent Kris Dunn and Bruno Fernando to BOS

assetsGivenUp.name: Delon Wright
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Pistons for Cory Joseph and two 2nd-round picks

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 1st Round Pick (SAC)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally conditional 2024 1st that did not convey, became 2025 1st
